description:
iFun Screenshot is a free, lightweight, yet powerful screenshot tool.

iFun Screenshot provides you multiple screenshot modes. It allows you to quickly capture any selected area, window, or full screen and easily pin them to your desktop, copy them to a clipboard, or save them to other locations according to your needs. Thus, taking screenshots for films, games, webinars, lectures, websites, folders, files, etc., will be easier than ever.
v1.2 (2021-06-10)
- Strengthened the screenshot editing feature by adding Line, Arrow, and Pixelation.
- Added the function to search similar images on Google.
- Optimized the update process to get the latest version more conveniently.
- Improved UI for better user experience.
- Improved multiple languages for better localization.
- Fixed known bugs.
